column4: Is there a way to open up ports without the use of a firewall?
most application installs will open the ports that you need
Hmm. Vnc fails to connect every time
most likely a firewall in between
are you at the machine you're connecting from?
i always have these issues with vnc. sigh. I'm trying to connect to my nongeek's friend's pc. She's got everything set up in "Remote Desktop" preferences but i can't ever connect
if you're both on ubuntu did you try the built in remote desktop viewer?
I'm not sure what ports it uses but it's worked for me from work to home with no firewall config changes
Yep. well, kind of. I told her to configure everything in Remote Desktop prefs, and she did. I've been using vncviewer but it always fails to connect
I tried that too, but always fails. Do I connect to her ip address or her broadcast address?
is she behind a router by chance?
